Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 1
SummaryContent: Lilith helps her aunt Madam Monzano kill Kurono agent Rosewater.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 2
SummaryContent: After the unexpected death of her foster parents, Lilith starts to run the Las Prados Casino with Madam Monzano. The two notice Kurono members in the city.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 3
SummaryContent: Before breaking free from Kurono, Monzano was in charge of researching the sustainability of the colony ship biosphere. Capehart, the Kurono councilor who works with Kilgore Trout, takes over the related projects, which draw Kurono's attention.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 4
SummaryContent: Kurono agent Rosewater is assassinated. Monzano takes away his "foster daughter" Discord, who's also a Kurono agent. Lilith and her childhood friend Discord meet again.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 5
SummaryContent: While Discord stays with Monzano for more intel, Monzano attempts to turn her as well. The Project Winter is on track. Monzano asks Lilith to sneak into the Fort Winter to clear her hostiles and collect intel.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 5
SummaryContent: While Discord stays with Monzano for more intel, Monzano attempts to turn her as well. The Project Winter is on track. Monzano asks Lilith to sneak into the Fort Winter to clear her hostiles and collect intel.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 6
SummaryContent: Discord asks Lilith to escape Monzano together. The Zero-point Engine Ignition Experiment fails, and the Punishing Virus breaks out.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 7
SummaryContent: A great evacuation starts in Las Prados. Monzano transfers all the citizens including Lilith to Babylonia and abandons Discord.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 8
SummaryContent: Vonnegut becomes an agent. Lilith accepts the Construct modification surgery in Babylonia.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 8
SummaryContent: Vonnegut becomes an agent. Lilith accepts the Construct modification surgery in Babylonia.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 9
SummaryContent: Discord accepts the Construct modification surgery and joins the Purifying Force, starting an investigation on Project Winter.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 10
SummaryContent: Discord used to be a homeless child in Las Prados. After Rosewater adopted her, Discord entered the orphanage established to cultivate candidates for early Construct human experiments and met Lilith for the first time.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 11
SummaryContent: Lilith starts a battlefield test with the prototype Constructs, during which they access the Ascension-Network and obtain the Punishing Code given by Vonnegut.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 12
SummaryContent: Lilith releases the Punishing Virus in Babylonia. The contagion causes initial chaos but is soon controlled.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 12
SummaryContent: Lilith releases the Punishing Virus in Babylonia. The contagion causes initial chaos but is soon controlled.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 13
SummaryContent: Monzano partly implements her M.I.N.D. transfer experiment by using the Punishing Virus as the medium.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 14
SummaryContent: Kurono shuts down the orphanage and integrates the experiment candidates into the newly founded Kurono intelligence agency. Lilith is adopted by the richest person in Las Prados, whereas Discord is grounded by Rosewater in the name of "protection." The two separate for the first time.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 15
SummaryContent: The virus concentration in Babylonia is rising. Monzano takes advantage of this and carries out the experiments. Lilith creates a space where the Ascension-Network's filtering can be implemented.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 16
SummaryContent: The Ascension-Network causes a large-scale defection of Constructs. Discord runs into an unknown Construct in the wilderness during mission and starts to question where Monzano and Lilith's true whereabouts.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 17
SummaryContent: Kurono decides to investigate the Ascendant's activities with the help of the army. Lilith reveals her true intention to Monzano. The two have a falling-out.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 17
SummaryContent: Kurono decides to investigate the Ascendant's activities with the help of the army. Lilith reveals her true intention to Monzano. The two have a falling-out.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 18
SummaryContent: Kurono exposes Babylonia's secret—the ecological experiment bunker built by Monzano. Kurono invites the army to start an investigation and conceals the fact that Project Winter remains active.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 19
SummaryContent: Discord and the Purifying Force enter Monzano's underground facilities and confront Lilith. Out of the two's shared objective, Lilith fights Monzano.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 19
SummaryContent: Discord and the Purifying Force enter Monzano's underground facilities and confront Lilith. Out of the two's shared objective, Lilith fights Monzano.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 20
SummaryContent: Lilith takes out the air strike force sent by the army with the power of the Ascension-Network. Vonnegut invites Lilith to join.

Title: Deceivers' Rapture: Chapter 21
SummaryContent: Lilith starts to take Vonnegut's assessment and meets Lithos. Luna is caught by Kurono and locked up in the lunar base. Meanwhile, Lilith feels interested in Alpha.

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 1
SummaryContent: The Gray Raven Commandant is invited to an opera by Ayla during vacation in Babylonia. Meanwhile, a confrontation between Iris and Enora Lueya starts somewhere else.

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 2
SummaryContent: The commandant comes to Ayla's studio. Attracted by Ayla's paintings, the commandant develops abnormal feelings.\nIn the meantime, Iris and Dandelion are looking for Jonathan in the theater.

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 2
SummaryContent: After the chaos, Dandelion leaves with Jonathan under the protection of Iris.

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 3
SummaryContent: A series of anomalies put the commandant on guard. The commandant and Ayla go to the Star of Life for a check-up. Here, the two come across Asimov. And it turns out what happened at the Science Council seems to have something to do with their situation.

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 4
SummaryContent: Babylonia starts an investigation on the abnormal phenomenon Gray Raven Commandant experienced. At the same time, Jonathan learns about the situation and his upcoming fate from Iris and Dandelion.

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 5
SummaryContent: Gray Raven Commandant carries out an investigation with Teddy's assistance. The clues are pointing directly to an unregistered frame named Capriccio. Ishmael at the Control Court also seems to have something to do with it.

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 6
SummaryContent: Following the lead, Gray Raven Commandant and Ayla arrive at a warehouse in the conservation area on the ground. However, unknown enemies appear and block their way. A battle starts.

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 6
SummaryContent: After the battle smoke clears away, Gray Raven Commandant finds themselves standing in an unfamiliar place and runs across a stranger.

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 7
SummaryContent: Using the alias F.O.S., Gray Raven Commandant gets to know the girl named Iris. The two go on a journey to Bane.

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 8
SummaryContent: In disguise, Gray Raven Commandant and Iris sneak into Montali International Airport and successfully carry out "an attack without any casualties".

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 9
SummaryContent: Teddy and Ayla investigate on Gray Raven Commandant's disappearance. In Babylonia, Asimov has a new finding with the abnormal device left by the invader...

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 10
SummaryContent: The operation at the airport was a success. Jonathan plans to head to Bane. On the way, Iris and F.O.S. spot an abandoned stage...

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 11
SummaryContent: They have a short, peaceful stay on the grassland on their way to Bane.

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 12
SummaryContent: The four arrive at Bane's capital. At the first light of dawn, Iris finally makes up her mind to say goodbye to her conductor.

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 12
SummaryContent: Iris had a great day with her conductor. In the twilight, the time has come to say goodbye.

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 13
SummaryContent: "It's all over." The Gray Raven Commandant says goodbye to Iris. However, back to their original timeline, the commandant realizes that things are far more complicated than they imagined.

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 14
SummaryContent: Ishmael remembers all the conversations she had with Selena. Meanwhile, the commandant, following the lead of the "Capriccio" frame, finds Ishmael and obtains the information about Enora Lueya.

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 15
SummaryContent: Iris chooses to confront Enora Lueya alone while the commandant realizes something is wrong. With Ishmael's hint, the commandant decides to return to Iris's timeline...

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 16
SummaryContent: Through the "echoes", the Gray Raven Commandant "sees" with the help of Hamlet the moments of receiving these letters and Iris... Or Selena, perhaps.

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 17
SummaryContent: Across the immeasurable time and space, the Gray Raven Commandant finally catches up with Selena before she banishes herself and stands beside her before Enora Lueya.

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 17
SummaryContent: Enora Lueya has been defeated. She struggles desperately but accidentally sees the Gray Raven Commandant's sealed "memories"...

Title: Dream till the Timeless End: Chapter 18
SummaryContent: At the end of the story, everyone is back where the journey started and lives happily together...

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 1
SummaryContent: A mysterious armed force appears around City 141, fighting against the Corrupted. The Commandant is ordered to sneak into City 141 to carry out an investigation.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 2
SummaryContent: The Commandant's transport vehicle has been attacked on the way to the city. In the battle against the Corrupted, there seems to be a faint figure of a mysterious girl...

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 2
SummaryContent: The commandant comes across the body of a student in the ruins. Out of respect for a soldier, the commandant takes her onto the transport vehicle.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 3
SummaryContent: The commandant comes alone to a college named Gestrig, where students are called weapons, participating in endless battles. Here, the commandant runs into Jetavie, the mysterious girl who fought alongside the commandant. She seems to be very interested in the commandant.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 4
SummaryContent: The bell suddenly rings when the commandant is exchanging information with girls named Bai and Ewig. Another battle starts. Due to the limitations of the secret investigation, the commandant is not able to participate. The commandant has a nightmare where Jetavie has passed away.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 5
SummaryContent: After the battle, the students support one another back to the college. The commandant sees Jetavie in the clock tower while she's fixing herself. She hopes the commandant can participate in the next battle.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 6
SummaryContent: Another battle begins. A battle that Jetavie drags the commandant into. Thanks to the commandant, there are no casualties. Meanwhile, someone seems to be secretly plotting to lure the Corrupted to attack the city.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 7
SummaryContent: The Commandant is warned by Martha for disobedience to orders. After the battle, Jetavie suspects that the attack from the Corrupted was targeted and decides to investigate City 141 following the lead of Bai's diary.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 8
SummaryContent: Following the lead of the diary, Jetavie comes to a milk tea shop. She invites the commandant for a short rest here.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 8
SummaryContent: The last page has been turned. Every location mentioned in the diary has been investigated. Ewig suddenly realizes something and feels empty inside.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 9
SummaryContent: A man named Horst comes to the commandant, hoping the latter can give up commanding the students. Jetavie and the Conductor follow him to a heavily guarded ruins.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 10
SummaryContent: The Commandant and Jetavie search around in the Matrix and find the transmitter that controls the Corrupted. However, the Corrupted are already there when they leave the Matrix.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 11
SummaryContent: Jetavie and other students guide the crowd to the college to take shelter. However, things don't look good as the Corrupted have already broken into the downtown area and the students' control is in Horst's hand.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 12
SummaryContent: Due to the emergency shutdown of other students, Jetavie has to defend the college on her own.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 12
SummaryContent: In her trance, Jetavie sees the Matrix again. After a fierce struggle, she still chooses to keep on fighting, protecting the broken reality.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 13
SummaryContent: Jetavie struggles back to a safe corner but reaches the verge of a consciousness collapse due to energy exhaustion. The commandant accesses the memory data as the Chosen One through the deep link to Jetavie. Through another "cycle," the commandant salvages Jetavie's collapsing consciousness.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 14
SummaryContent: Jetavie and the commandant get back on track thanks to the Task Force's timely support. The two follow the traces left by the clown to a factory that looks like an amusement park.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 14
SummaryContent: Jetavie and the commandant find some training data of the clown by a control panel in the factory. This entity was generated based on the Leibowitz Commandant. Endless trainings have caused a degeneration of its mind. Now it regards destruction as a game.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 15
SummaryContent: Jetavie and the commandant arrives in the depths of the factory, ready for the final battle against the clown.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 15
SummaryContent: Having defeated the clown, Jetavie and the commandant return to Babylonia. The two successfully solve the man-made crisis and free other students.

Title: Begin Anew: Chapter 16
SummaryContent: Horst had a serious illness when he was little. His parents therefore bought an Android that looked exactly like him. When he's back home again, there was no longer a place for him, which gave birth to his extreme view about smart robots and eventually resulted in the tragedy of himself and City 141.

Title: Begin Anew: Hidden: Chapter 1
SummaryContent: New researcher Herta has been taken to a lab, the owner of which is a girl called Yui who became extremely weak in a series of sampling experiments. Manager Horst doesn't seem to be concerned about it and forces her to submit the model of the Chosen One as soon as possible.

Title: Begin Anew: Hidden: Chapter 2
SummaryContent: Due to the overfitting problem of the Chosen One, Yui attempts to perform a memory sampling with Herta's help. In the experiment, she remembers being beaten by her father in her childhood.

Title: Begin Anew: Hidden: Chapter 3
SummaryContent: Abandoned by her father, Yui went on a solo journey of finding her mother. Just when she's in the joy of finally getting the love of her mother, she suddenly realizes that she's nothing but a "ticket" in her mother's eyes. When the Corrupted come, she's pushed to the exit by the kids in the sewer, yet a Corrupted catches her by her ankle at the exit. She has to struggle to get out alone.

Title: Begin Anew: Hidden: Chapter 4
SummaryContent: The sampling ends. The experiment has given birth to a rather interesting model. Yui names it VI. However, Horst suddenly breaks in and takes VI away. The stimulation test on VI causes things to fall onto the floor and break. Worried about VI, VI rushes out.

Title: Begin Anew: Hidden: Chapter 5
SummaryContent: During the dreadful test, signal of the Chosen One suddenly breaks in and blocks the pulse for VI. When both models are on the verge of collapse, Yui links them back from the test.

Title: Begin Anew: Hidden: Chapter 6
SummaryContent: The commandant wakes up from the immersion in Babylonia with no memory of what just happened. A girl who calls herself "Lesti" briefly explains why the commandant was chosen for the mission and the cause of the memory loss.

Title: Begin Anew: Hidden: Chapter 7
SummaryContent: Yui's adjustment has help VI's model overcome the risk of collapse. However, Horst asks Yui to give him the model capsule for the sake of experiment progress. In this critical moment, the Chosen One appears again and uses the illegal data as evidence to stop Horst. Enraged, Horst accelerates the experiment at the risk of it going out of control.

Title: Begin Anew: Hidden: Chapter 8
SummaryContent: It's VI's birthday. However, when Yui's back with the gift "White Case", she sees many haywire Corrupted around the Matrix. Worried about VI's safety, Yui rushes to the lab without hesitation.

Title: Begin Anew: Hidden: Chapter 9
SummaryContent: Back to VI's side, Yui is already seriously injured. To keep VI alive in the high Punishing concentration, Yui has to activate the awakening training codenamed Derivation. Before passing out, Yui opens the link port to the Chosen One, forming a connection to the commandant's consciousness. A trial cycle of the commandant and VI has thus started.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 2
SummaryContent: In 2160, Vera, a cadet at the Military Academy, participated in a counter-terrorism operation where she rescued the lone survivor.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 2
SummaryContent: The Control Court suspects the survivor is actually "Haynes," the terrorism suspect.\nVera is assigned to monitor the suspect.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 3
SummaryContent: Vera arrives at the military hospital and boldly initiates contact with the suspect to gather intelligence.\nJust as she confirms this person is "Haynes," the subject the Control Court is seeking who requires higher security measures, the Punishing Disaster erupts. In the ensuing chaos, Haynes takes his own life.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 4
SummaryContent: Years later, Vera, now a Kurono Construct, encounters a scene eerily similar to the eve of the Punishing Disaster.\nTo save you, a human from the F.O.S. Military College, she improvises by using precious test materials meant for her mission to seal the wound on your abdomen.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 5
SummaryContent: You suffered head trauma, occasionally experiencing memory lapses. Vera exploits this to deceive you and quickly learn about your situation.\nBefore the two of you can exchange more information, a horde of Corrupted reaches the temporary medical station, forcing Vera to evacuate with you.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 6
SummaryContent: Now—after finding the "key" among the Hummingbird's Remains, the Gray Raven Commandant and Vera follow Kurono member Haniff aboard a ship to begin their journey in search of the "secret treasure," only to be attacked by an Ascendant impersonating "Lloyd."\nThe ship is destroyed, throwing everyone into the sea. The Gray Raven Commandant's ankle is ensnared by a curious Hetero-Creature, nearly causing them to drown.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 7
SummaryContent: Back to the past—Kurono Construct Vera attempts to bring you to the Kurono base to deliver the materials needed for her mission. However, you repeatedly offer help to others along the way, causing an ever-growing number of refugees to follow the two of you.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 7
SummaryContent: The group enters a bombed area where, after another F.O.S. student sacrifices himself, you take a box containing abnormal virus samples from his hands. It needs to be delivered to a base with analysis capabilities.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 8
SummaryContent: The group receives help from a kind-hearted, dog-loving "Madam Wang" and arrives at a nearby conservation area where they learn the details of this abnormal situation. Your classmates Vanessa and Simon also happen to be in this conservation area.\nTo transport the important virus samples, a makeshift team composed of Kurono Constructs, F.O.S. students, and conservation area personnel is formed.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 9
SummaryContent: Now—inside a gene bank on a solitary island, a Hetero-Creature has begun to "evolve," and has been named "Eve."\nEve attempts to understand human genes, memories, and emotions. After leaving the gene bank, it discovers the Gray Raven Commandant adrift in the ocean. But before it can extract more information from you, Vera forcefully yanks you out of the sea.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 10
SummaryContent: The Gray Raven Commandant, rescued from the sea just in time by Vera, regains consciousness. Earlier, the three of them were swept onto a solitary island by an Ascendant. Vera engaged it in battle, forcing it to reveal its true form. After a tense confrontation, the Gray Raven Commandant realizes they must kill "Eve" to prevent the evolving Hetero-Creature from spreading and growing stronger.\nMeanwhile, Babylonia also begins to take action. Kurono, seizing the opportunity, decides to dispatch the transport aircraft closest to the island to provide assistance, and "conveniently" deliver a test frame belonging to Vera.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 11
SummaryContent: The Garnet frame is nearly beyond repair. The support transport aircraft reaches the island but quickly crashes. The Gray Raven Commandant discovers a never-before-seen new Vera frame in the aircraft wreckage and initiates the frame synchronization process, but the data synchronization progresses extremely slowly.\nTo prevent the Hetero-Creature from evolving further, the desperate Gray Raven Commandant decides to lead Haniff into the gene bank to eliminate "Eve."

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 12
SummaryContent: Back to the past—The makeshift team gets off to a rough start, encountering a fierce battle. Fortunately, a Construct named Leia arrives just in time to help evacuate people from Conservation Area 062, reportedly bringing back a suspect in this disaster.\nDuring the evacuation, Vera is shocked to discover that the "suspect" captured by Leia is named Haynes.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 13
SummaryContent: This "Haynes" is identical to the old man who took his own life in front of Vera. He has accepted Gabriel's guidance and is now implementing a new plan. Under Haynes' operation, the virus spreads once again, and the sample container protected by you becomes damaged. In this critical moment, you use testing material from your own abdominal wound to seal the container's breach.\nStunned by your choice, Vera decides to help you achieve your goal.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 14
SummaryContent: Now—the Gray Raven Commandant, carrying Vera on their back as she undergoes data synchronization, enters the gene bank with Haniff.\nThe Gray Raven Commandant recognizes the F.O.S. badge on Haniff, who then reveals his true purpose: he came to find someone named "Haynes," a name deeply connected to his life.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 15
SummaryContent: The Gray Raven Commandant and Haniff find "Eve", discovering that it's fond of mimicking them.\nBesides this, the two overhear a conversation between the Ascendant and an old man, learning that they are the masterminds behind this catastrophe, and that countless embryos lie dormant, waiting to hatch deep within the gene bank.\nTaking advantage of the disagreement between the two "villains," the Gray Raven Commandant uses "Eve" and the Hetero-Creature to fight against the Ascendant. However, both the commandant and Haniff sustain serious injuries, forcing them to split up—Haniff goes to find and destroy the remaining embryos, while the commandant stays behind to confront the enemy and protect Vera until she awakens.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 16
SummaryContent: Meanwhile, Vera's Geiravor frame nears the end of its data synchronization: the memory data replays the final moments she spent with you years ago. To fulfill your objective, she pulls out her frame's plug, cuts the rope, and watches as the severely wounded you rushes toward the base with the sample container.\nAs she sacrifices herself, she realizes that all of this is merely data being replayed within her M.I.N.D., and decides to return to reality. In the real world, you—the one who has grown to become the Gray Raven Commandant—needs her.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 17
SummaryContent: For this "reunion" years in the making, Vera and the Gray Raven Commandant fight with all their might.\nVera wrests control of the Geiravor frame from Kurono's system. Vera: Geiravor awakens at the critical moment, slays Eve, and saves the commandant.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 18
SummaryContent: Vera eliminates all the Hetero-Creatures blocking their path and leads the commandant deep into the gene bank to catch up with Haniff and to kill another "Haynes".\nHaving revisited their shared past in different ways, the two have much to say to each other, but time is against them.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 19
SummaryContent: Haniff finds the embryos and prepares to activate the base's self-destruct sequence, but is stopped by the elderly Haynes. Haynes reveals the truth about his identity and invites him to become the next "Haynes." But Haniff decides to end the Haynes cycle with his own hands and engages him in combat.\nVera and the Gray Raven Commandant arrive just in time. Vera takes the killing blow from Haniff and slays Haynes, and together they watch as the gene bank is engulfed in destructive flames.\nBut the crisis isn't over yet—the Ascendant is still alive. Vera decides to stay behind and challenge the Ascendant at her full power.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 20
SummaryContent: Before breaking herself once more, Vera remembers her original purpose. She recalls why she decided to help the commandant back then, and sees clearly the connection between them.\nThis time, she willingly becomes the commandant's blade, gladly accepting to burn until nothing remains in their hands.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 20
SummaryContent: Vera defeats the Ascendant. The original "Lloyd" bows its head and dissipates into the old world.\nFrom afar, Lilith seems to sense something interesting.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 21
SummaryContent: Having unleashed her frame's full power, Vera indeed goes haywire. Within her burning M.I.N.D., through the voices of old friends, she revisits the heroic choices she witnessed throughout her life.\nShe believes this is her end, but fate doesn't allow her to leave—the commandant doesn't allow her to leave.\nRefusing to accept such a hasty conclusion, the commandant forcibly connects with the haywire Construct, reclaims her will, and guides the blade back to its sheath.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 22
SummaryContent: Babylonia's support forces rescue all three people from the island, with no casualties. In a dream, the commandant recalls various memories from the past—the eve of graduation, and the red Construct who helped deliver the virus sample to its destination.\nUpon opening their eyes again, Vera is right there.\nVanessa arrives with all members of Egret to visit, while the surviving Haniff makes his own choice. Meanwhile, the commandant receives a package of unknown origin containing the name tags of all previous "Lloyds".

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 23
SummaryContent: In the wastelands of Las Prados, the Gray Mako Squad from "Babylonia" begins to question if a new world exists beyond the "Red Line." During their 103rd secret exploration, the Gray Mako Squad finally get their chance to venture beyond the "Red Line," only to be brutally killed.\nThe surviving member, Lloyd, discovers that all of Las Prados is merely a Punishing Virus testing ground for "Babylonia."

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 24
SummaryContent: The Gray Squad is reduced to Lloyd alone. He conceals his true self and secretly begins preparing for a mass escape.\nFinally, one day, he uses the Punishing Virus to contaminate the testing ground's central hub, leading all Constructs in an escape from "Babylonia." Only after fleeing do they discover that the entire "Babylonia" was a fa?ade, the whole station merely an experimental facility built on the ground.\nAll the escaped Constructs perish in the windswept sands of Las Prados. Once again, Lloyd alone survives.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 25
SummaryContent: Lloyd is fortunate to be rescued and brought to the real Babylonia by two Constructs. Cherishing this "new world" and each of his comrades, he fights ferociously and claims to possess the ability of "Recall," gradually earning the title of "Undying Lloyd."\nBut the Ascendant Gabriel destroys everything, killing Lloyd's comrades and taking half of his skull in an attempt to guide him down the path of ascension.

Title: Spark to Wildfire: Chapter 26
SummaryContent: Lloyd refuses Gabriel's invitation and insists on returning to Babylonia, only to discover they've already replaced him with an impostor to maintain the lie of Recall. Having lost his place, Lloyd begins wandering the earth.\nOnly after witnessing his once-respected Leader fall to become a "villain" does Lloyd realize the error isn't solely with the Punishing Virus. Human civilization has begun rotting from within.\nHe resolves to cleanse humanity of its putrid flesh and become the precipice of the new world.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Prologue
SummaryContent: Thomas Hell has been attempting to reverse time using a Hetero Tower shard, but years of failure send him spiraling into madness, triggering a series of chaotic events.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 1
SummaryContent: Having received a distress signal from a conservation area, Gray Raven advances to rescue. There, they run into a mysterious man.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 2
SummaryContent: Gray Raven follows Dante and Fann to New Oakley, where Commandant forms an alliance with Dante. The group discovers Vergil's whereabouts through footage obtained from the conservation area.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 3
SummaryContent: While tracking Hetero-Creatures on the surface, Alpha crosses paths with Vergil, leading to a fierce battle between them. However, the strange behavior of the Hetero-Creatures interrupts their confrontation.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 3
SummaryContent: While tracking Hetero-Creatures on the surface, Alpha crosses paths with Vergil, leading to a fierce battle between them. However, the strange behavior of the Hetero-Creatures interrupts their confrontation.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 4
SummaryContent: Alpha reaches out to the Gray Raven Commandant. Prior to this, Alpha and Vergil had saved a girl named Lyca from Hetero-Creatures, who claims to know information about the mastermind behind everything—the Mirror Demon.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 5
SummaryContent: Armed with new insights about the Mirror Demon, the group decides to gather in New Oakley before embarking toward the Mirror Demon's lair—the Babel Tower.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 6
SummaryContent: Following the successful defense against yet another Hetero-Creature attack, the residents of New Oakley celebrate their brief peace. Dante and Vergil appear to have discovered some hidden truths regarding Lyca.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 6
SummaryContent: Following the successful defense against yet another Hetero-Creature attack, the residents of New Oakley celebrate their brief peace. Dante and Vergil appear to have discovered some hidden truths regarding Lyca.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 7
SummaryContent: As the group assembles and progresses toward the Babel Tower. Facing an overwhelming swarm of Hetero-Creatures, Dante and Vergil reveal their formidable Sin Devil Trigger forms.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 8
SummaryContent: Having successfully broken through the blockade of Hetero-Creatures, the group explores the interior of the Babel Tower. Meanwhile, the Hetero-Creatures outside begin their march toward New Oakley.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 8
SummaryContent: Having successfully broken through the blockade of Hetero-Creatures, the group explores the interior of the Babel Tower. Meanwhile, the Hetero-Creatures outside begin their march toward New Oakley.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 9
SummaryContent: Inside the Babel Tower, the group stumbles upon numerous civilians who had been captured by Hetero-Creatures. Lucia, Liv, and Lee are tasked with escorting the civilians to safety, while Commandant and the rest press on with the ascent. Meanwhile, back in town, Lyca unleashes a formidable surge of power when confronted by attacking Hetero-Creatures.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 10
SummaryContent: Reaching the 38th floor of Babel Tower, Commandant discovers remnants of a bygone laboratory and decides to collect all the experiment data Thomas Hell left behind here.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 11
SummaryContent: In New Oakley, Lyca recalls memories from her past and decides to head to the Babel Tower.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 12
SummaryContent: Dante and Vergil reach the 40th floor of the Babel Tower, coming face-to-face with the Mirror Demon as battle becomes inevitable.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 13
SummaryContent: Confronted by the Mirror Demon and its exceptional regenerative powers, the group struggles to bring the battle to a decisive conclusion despite defeating it. Faced with this impasse, Lyca steps up and makes her choice.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 13
SummaryContent: Confronted by the Mirror Demon and its exceptional regenerative powers, the group struggles to bring the battle to a decisive conclusion despite defeating it. Faced with this impasse, Lyca steps up and makes her choice.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 14
SummaryContent: After the Babel Tower incident reaches its conclusion, Dante and Vergil share a brief stay in Babylonia. The data collected from the tower has served its purpose. The moment of parting draws near.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 14
SummaryContent: After the Babel Tower incident reaches its conclusion, Dante and Vergil share a brief stay in Babylonia. The data collected from the tower has served its purpose. The moment of parting draws near.

Title: Lamento di Phantasma: Chapter 15
SummaryContent: On an ordinary day, Vergil makes an attempt.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 1
SummaryContent: Bianca's mind wanders through the sandstorm, with towering ruins appearing on both sides. The sand beneath her feet gradually turns to mud, and she sinks into a whirlpool—

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 2
SummaryContent: Lucia and the commandant accept a support mission at the Copperfield Aquarium. Meanwhile, the commandant experiences a faint sense of deja vu again, glimpsing a vision of Chiko and Bianca sinking into the Red Tide in the sea.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 3
SummaryContent: In the aquarium, Bianca and several Purifying Force members have found some "Scarlet Revelation" members, but still no trace of Chiko.\nMeanwhile, Vonnegut and Lithos are attempting to use the Red Tide to incubate a fusion of Chiko and the dismembered remains of Hetero-Humanoid twins.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 4
SummaryContent: The Commandant's "warning" makes Babylonia adjust the mission's priority. Strike Hawk and Gray Raven are dispatched, with Cerberus joining them from another direction.\nThe "tropical fish" in the aquarium records Chiko and Bianca's exploration here.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 5
SummaryContent: The councilors of Babylonia refuse to deploy Omega Weapons to help contain the Red Tide at the aquarium. Asimov brings news that Bianca's Stigmata frame has developed severe M.I.N.D. deviation, suggesting they may need to activate her new frame—Crepuscule.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 6
SummaryContent: While exploring level B2 of the aquarium, the commandant and the others encounter Lulu, a Construct claiming to be a member of "Scarlet Revelation."

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 7
SummaryContent: Based on the commandant's intelligence, Cerberus locates the Red Tide's drainage outlet. However, due to insufficient Omega Weapons, Vera decides to bomb and sink the ship, using their limited Omega Weapons to block the water exit.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 8
SummaryContent: Countless Hetero-Creatures emerge from the Red Tide in the aquarium. Bianca is severely injured while covering the retreat. Grace from Scarlet Revelation struggles to escape with Bianca on her back.\nMeanwhile, Bianca's new frame—Crepuscule—has arrived along with the Engineering Force.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 9
SummaryContent: Just as the Purifying Force members can no longer hold out, the commandant and the others successfully join Bianca.\nKarenina and Teddy from the Engineering Force have entered the aquarium, bringing Bianca's Crepuscule frame with them as support.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 10
SummaryContent: The Red Tide surges as the commandant has strange visions once again. This time, however, Babylonia has already taken preemptive measures—but will they be able to save Chiko?\nVonnegut's voice echoes through the loudspeaker, inviting the commandant to a designated area for a talk.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 11
SummaryContent: Bianca experiences a vision within her M.I.N.D. Chiko struggles to push her out of the Red Tide.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 11
SummaryContent: After switching to her new frame, Bianca rushes to the commandant's side. On her way, fragments of memories surface in her mind—some perhaps from this timeline, others seemingly from elsewhere.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 12
SummaryContent: In a final effort, Chiko transmits information to the commandant through "deja vu." The commandant suddenly wakes up to find Vonnegut right before them.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 13
SummaryContent: Lithos finds the escaped Chiko and leads her through the underwater tunnel beneath the aquarium to a small island. There, Lithos places Chiko on an altar at the center of the island to proceed with the incubation.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 14
SummaryContent: The commandant reunites with Bianca, but their return path completely collapses under Vonnegut's control. With no other choice, Bianca and the commandant must continue forward through the underwater tunnel beneath the aquarium.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 14
SummaryContent: Chiko's "incubation" succeeds, but her more complete M.I.N.D. allows her consciousness to take dominant control of the body. In her Haywire state, Chiko kills Lithos.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 15
SummaryContent: Following the tunnel beneath the island, Bianca and the commandant discover Chiko, who has been reborn within the island's depths.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 15
SummaryContent: Bianca defeats Chiko, who had been "re-incubated" by Lithos, and "purifies" the Red Tide in the area. From Chiko's shell, a Heteromer Shard crystallizes.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 16
SummaryContent: Upon returning to Babylonia with the Heteromer Shard, the commandant unexpectedly glimpses Nanami's future when touching the shard...

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 17
SummaryContent: Humans extract an astonishing amount of information from the Heteromer Shard. Perhaps things can truly develop in the most favorable direction.\nWill it really be that way?

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 18
SummaryContent: Bianca's M.I.N.D. suffers severe deviation. Within the Red Tide, Chiko crafts a dream for her where they live as ordinary children in Babylonia.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 19
SummaryContent: Chiko never agreed with Bianca's ideas, yet she always wondered what would happen if she let this naive fool continue on her path.

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 20
SummaryContent: Chiko leaves, having done her utmost to push Bianca out of the Red Tide. She leaves Bianca with the right to choose—if given the choice, would Bianca want to be a witch, or a Holy Maiden?

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 21
SummaryContent: The lack of supplies and the heavy rain make Grace wonder how to lead these Scarlet Revelation followers onward.\nIn this moment of uncertainty, they discover an invitation to a "trial."

Title: Echoes Adrift: Chapter 22
SummaryContent: Could the "trial" be real? Grace leads the small Scarlet Revelation team to the seaside, but remains skeptical throughout.\nThe followers wait anxiously for their entrance into eternal life. Eventually, Grace decides to split up—Lulu will stay behind at the camp while she takes others into the aquarium to undertake the "trial"...

Title: Dreams Rewound: Chapter 1
SummaryContent: The Merciful One watches over it all. The seeds have already been sown, and their fruits are about to ripen. She observes as the Gray Raven Commandant journeys through this river of time.

Title: Dreams Rewound: Chapter 2
SummaryContent: Vanessa gives a report on the Kurono Orphanage. The Science Council applies the recovered technology to Hyperreal frames. With the Gray Raven Commandant present, Lee undergoes a frame replacement.

Title: Dreams Rewound: Chapter 3
SummaryContent: After receiving the new Hyperreal frame, Lee has an unexpected glimpse of a deeper version of himself within the M.I.N.D.

Title: Dreams Rewound: Chapter 4
SummaryContent: Ayla receives the Kaleido frame. Her mission is to use it to form a special team led by a Commandant for high-risk operations on behalf of the Archaeological Team. Their first mission is already underway. During the operation, the Iris Warbler squad uncovers the existence of Constellia...

Title: Dreams Rewound: Chapter 5
SummaryContent: Luna "sees" Alpha standing before the crystal cluster that holds her. She "sees" Alpha and Lucia enter Fort Winter, and "sees" Alpha carry Lucia away. She senses the unrest of the Punishing Virus.\nMeanwhile, in the Dead Zone, Vera and No. 21 go missing while on a mission inside a conservation area...

Title: Dreams Rewound: Chapter 6
SummaryContent: Vonnegut watches The Cradle as it grows. Lithos hesitates at the door, then steps in to report: Kugawa Kurono is dead—killed by his adopted daughter, a girl named Alisa. The M.I.N.D. fusion experiment at the Utopia branch has failed.\nNow, Vonnegut cares about only two things: Cthylla, who will soon hatch Chaos, and the mysterious "Tower" that has yet to arrive.

Title: Dreams Rewound: Chapter 7
SummaryContent: The Forsaken officially join the Oasis faction and reach a trade deal with Babylonia. Babylonia agrees to help upgrade some of the Forsaken's Central Purification Filter cores, and in return, Oasis provides them with much-needed supplies.\nAfter hearing about Babylonia's new technology, Kowloong also proposes a deal, hoping to cooperate on building a maritime defense line against the Punishing Virus.

Title: Dreams Rewound: Chapter 8
SummaryContent: Qu "dies" and is brought back to life. Inside the Tabula Akasha, she lives through countless "stories."

Title: Dreams Rewound: Chapter 8
SummaryContent: After clearing out the digital specters from the Tabula Akasha, Babylonia sends personnel to help Kowloong upgrade their defense Light Wall. Once the task is finished, the commandant records the keyword from the "invitation."

Title: Dreams Rewound: Chapter 9
SummaryContent: At the Science Council, Teddy locates the internal data wall inside Gestalt. The Parliament decides to open it.\nWith help from Teddy and Asimov, the commandant uses the "invitation" to meet Dominik, who exists within Gestalt.

Title: Dreams Rewound: Chapter 10
SummaryContent: The data wall is opened, and Dark Star is born. Selene falls from Babylonia to the surface with one goal: eliminate Luna and seize full authority granted by the Ascension-Network. The network only supports one agent. If Selene fully takes shape, Luna will perish. She must act before that happens. Alpha and Lamia lead the Red Tide to her location. Luna absorbs a massive amount of it, pushing herself beyond her limits in an attempt to break free from the Ascension-Network.

Title: Dreams Rewound: Chapter 10
SummaryContent: At the final moment of Luna's standoff with Selene, Roland arrives with the Gray Raven Commandant and squad. The Commandant helps Luna stabilize her still-forming M.I.N.D. With this support, Luna defeats Selene and gains full control of the Ascension-Network.

Title: Dreams Rewound: Chapter 11
SummaryContent: As Lucia syncs with the Pyroath frame, her once-faded memories begin to sharpen. But she can't tell if they're real or just illusions brought on by M.I.N.D. fluctuations. What she remembers doesn't match reality—there's no crimson tower, and she's never seen the so-called "Clean Zone."

Title: Dreams Rewound: Chapter 12
SummaryContent: During a mission, Lucia becomes separated from the other three. She sees a white mist and enters a strange realm. Inside, she encounters strange shadows and sees many who are supposed to be "dead"—

Title: Dreams Rewound: Chapter 13
SummaryContent: Near Zero-point Reactor No. 1, the Gray Raven squad finds Vonnegut preparing to restart the reactor.

Title: Dreams Rewound: Chapter 13
SummaryContent: In his final moments, Vonnegut flees deep into the reactor. Lucia follows and finds him lifeless at the heart of a Punishing Virus outbreak.\nOnce Vonnegut is defeated, the Red Tide surges. As Lucia stands still, a flood of memories rushes into her mind—

Title: Dreams Rewound: Chapter 14
SummaryContent: The Merciful One closes the book. "Everything changed because of you, Gray Raven."\nThe Commandant asks about Nanami and the Hetero Tower, and the Merciful One answers each question.\nBut the true future is still out there, waiting for the Gray Raven Commandant to face it and discover it firsthand.

Title: Woven Prologue: Chapter 1
SummaryContent: In the garbage dump on the outskirts of Las Prados, two forgotten vagabonds suddenly hear a cry when rummaging for food.

Title: Woven Prologue: Chapter 2
SummaryContent: The girl grew up under the old tailor's care, but the cozy tailor workshop is now facing a major crisis.

Title: Woven Prologue: Chapter 3
SummaryContent: The conspiracy unfolds. The girl jolts awake from her slumber as a massive fire erupts in the dead of night, forcing her to flee the workshop.

Title: Woven Prologue: Chapter 5
SummaryContent: Discord enters Polard Orphanage, an agency established to cultivate candidates for early Construct human experiments and meets a girl named Eleanor.

Title: Woven Prologue: Chapter 7
SummaryContent: The truth buried for years finally comes to light, but the maid hesitates in the face of the real culprit. Severely wounded, she pleads with Eleanor for an order.

Title: Woven Prologue: Chapter 8
SummaryContent: In the viewless room, Discord becomes deeply trapped in illusion under "Eleanor's" companionship, gradually losing herself.

Title: Woven Prologue: Chapter 9
SummaryContent: As a maid of the Monzano family, Discord clears all opposition to serve Madam Monzano. She once yearned for freedom but ultimately bows to the new order and is sent back to Kurono to be transformed into a Construct.

Title: Woven Prologue: Chapter 10
SummaryContent: After joining the Purifying Force, Discord finds herself in a difficult situation, unable to even remember what she cares about. In a daze, she seems to recall someone asking her the same question before.

Title: Woven Prologue: Chapter 11
SummaryContent: In a Scarab squad mission, Yata pulls Discord out of a dream of her past. Now the squad's captain, Yata resolves to inherit Shorthalt's will and save her comrades no matter what.

Title: Woven Prologue: Chapter 12
SummaryContent: Scarab's commander Valeria applies for a new frame for Discord. To replace her as she recovers from mental exhaustion caused by mending Discord's M.I.N.D., the Gray Raven Commandant joins Scarab on an infiltration mission in Las Prados.

Title: Woven Prologue: Chapter 13
SummaryContent: The Gray Raven Commandant helps Discord stabilize her M.I.N.D. In the subsequent confrontation with an Ascendant, Discord gets infected by the Punishing Virus and falls into a deep coma.

Title: Woven Prologue: Chapter 14
SummaryContent: Within her inner sandbox, she finishes sorting through her memories, cutting away her past self, and decides to raise the scissors—

Title: Woven Prologue: Chapter 15
SummaryContent: Scarab brings back new experimental data. After waking up, Discord will embark on a new path with her companions, weaving new melodies together.

Title: Ideal Cage: Chapter 1
SummaryContent: At the end of the Golden Age, crowds of spectators eagerly await the brutal mechanoid gladiator battles to begin. Among them, a gladiator named Veronica is about to step into the arena for the very first time.

Title: Ideal Cage: Chapter 2
SummaryContent: This gladiatorial arena doesn't just imprison mechanoids trying to break free—it also traps a number of unfortunate humans within its walls.

Title: Ideal Cage: Chapter 3
SummaryContent: A young mechanic named Serra meets Veronica for the first time in an atmosphere thick with tension and hostility, and their encounter is far from pleasant.

Title: Ideal Cage: Chapter 4
SummaryContent: Over time, a friendship begins to grow between Serra and Veronica. Meanwhile, in the hidden corners of the arena, the watchful eyes of the "Master" fix upon the one-of-a-kind Veronica.

Title: Ideal Cage: Chapter 5
SummaryContent: Serra, who longs for freedom, refuses to let the arena chain her down. Beneath her careful disguises, she sets her secret plan into motion.

Title: Ideal Cage: Chapter 6
SummaryContent: Beneath a simulated starry sky, Serra and Veronica make a pact to escape. Yet in the shadows, another pair of human eyes watches closely, waiting for the right moment to strike.

Title: Ideal Cage: Chapter 7
SummaryContent: Betrayal is born from trust once given, and human greed consumes what little selfless friendship remains. Both Veronica and Serra become victims of this cruel trap.\nAnd behind it all, the arena's "Master", Dolores, smiles as she reaps the rewards of their suffering.

Title: Ideal Cage: Chapter 8
SummaryContent: Under Dolores' coercion, Serra is forced into a vile plan: steal Veronica's powerful mechanical body for the disabled "Master".\nWhen faced with her former friend's fury, the desperate girl offers no defense for herself.

Title: Ideal Cage: Chapter 8
SummaryContent: In the midst of crisis, Veronica finally understands Serra's true intentions. Raising her lance once more, she resolves to carve a bloody path to freedom for them both.

Title: Ideal Cage: Chapter 9
SummaryContent: Across the vast snowfields, Veronica and Serra taste true freedom for the very first time. But moments later, Veronica realizes it is nothing more than a hollow dream.\nShe remains trapped inside the prison-like arena, never having left at all.

Title: Ideal Cage: Chapter 10
SummaryContent: After the Punishing Virus outbreak, the once magnificent arena now lies in ruins, yet Dolores still calmly awaits Veronica's arrival.\nWith her mind twisted beyond recognition, she prepares to unleash her ultimate weapon and complete her plan.

Title: Ideal Cage: Chapter 10
SummaryContent: Everything has come to an end. The bloodlust and cheers of the arena are buried beneath smoke and dust. Veronica, free once more, spreads her wings and soars into the open sky.

Title: Ideal Cage: Chapter 11
SummaryContent: In the vast expanse of the free world, Veronica walks in silence. At the end of it all, she bids farewell to her human friend, Serra.

Title: Ideal Cage: Chapter 12
SummaryContent: In a lavish manor, young Dolores lives in carefree bliss under her parents' loving care. But this short-lived happiness ends abruptly when her mother falls gravely ill.

Title: Ideal Cage: Chapter 13
SummaryContent: Her mother's death drives her father to lock himself away in his laboratory for years. Rumors spread, and in time Delores learns the horrifying truth—he is trying to transfer her mother's consciousness into a mechanoid.

Title: Ideal Cage: Chapter 14
SummaryContent: Years of illness and isolation twist Dolores into paranoia and suspicion. After eliminating everyone and everything that stood in her way, a wicked idea takes root in her mind—the creation of a mechanical gladiator arena.

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 1
SummaryContent: A presence lurks in the darkness, attempting to pry into Liv's M.I.N.D...\nSo, what exactly is M.I.N.D.?

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 2
SummaryContent: The commandant wakes up in Conservation Area 368. This time, the pair is tasked with a special mission: to find the people who know about the "Phylotree".

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 3
SummaryContent: A Conservation Area 368 resident who snuck onto Babylonia holds the clue about the "Phylotree"?

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 4
SummaryContent: Liv compiles a shortlist of just seven suspects who might have the information they need.

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 4
SummaryContent: After an unexpected fight, the two find the vehicle "accidentally" damaged by Hetero-Creatures. Now, they have no choice but to return to the conservation area.

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 5
SummaryContent: Conservation Area 368 is eerily quiet. The doctor on the list doesn't appear to be human. What is her true purpose here? Under the cover of night, the two move to investigate.

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 6
SummaryContent: When the two arrive, Dr. Melinoe seems prepared. She admits that she once worked as a "psychologist" in the mining area...

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 7
SummaryContent: Finding no further clues in the conservation area, the two make for the mining area again. However, they discover something unexpected on the way there...

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 8
SummaryContent: The mine is a dark void pierced by scant light. The tracks they follow are fresh, and one set is seemingly a child's. What would a child be doing here?

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 9
SummaryContent: After a quick check of the child's condition, the two decide to leave the mine for now and take her back to the conservation area. A minor tremor shakes the mine, but nothing seems to happen.

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 10
SummaryContent: A moment of clarity hits Liv as she realizes this entire conservation area is an illusion. Meanwhile, the commandant continues to struggle forward with the child.

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 11
SummaryContent: Melinoe enters the mine, revealing that the lost child is one she once rescued. As a mechanoid, she couldn't raise a human and had entrusted the child to a local family.

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 12
SummaryContent: With the terrible signal in the mine, Liv tries everything she can to contact the commandant. But why are Hetero-Creatures now showing up in the safe zone?

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 12
SummaryContent: Terminal communications fail in the mine. Liv takes a grave risk, touching the scars in her own M.I.N.D. to reforge the connection with the commandant.

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 13
SummaryContent: As the commandant hides with the child from Hetero-Creatures in the mine, "Liv" suddenly shows up... Who is behind the "illusion" here?

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 14
SummaryContent: Phantoms swarm more frequently, and the one controlling these illusions has even accessed Liv's M.I.N.D. Meanwhile, Liv finally fights her way to the safe zone, hoping to rendezvous with the commandant...

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 15
SummaryContent: Liv witnesses Commandant's "death" with her own eyes. Running her fingers over the bullet, she contemplates everything that has happened here...

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 16
SummaryContent: This is a "home"... one built together by Commandant and Liv.

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 17
SummaryContent: Melinoe sees the entire "illusion" for what it is. Though part of her is tempted by this peaceful life, she is determined to give the child what it wants...

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 18
SummaryContent: In the dead of night, the "child" opens her bright golden eyes. She gazes at Liv, a greedy desire swelling within her tiny frame.

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 19
SummaryContent: Liv and the commandant shatter the illusion, but Melinoe quickly weaves new ones using the "child's" power. The "child" wants to devour Liv and the commandant, and she will certainly do as it wishes...

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 20
SummaryContent: Liv's counterattack breaks Melinoe's concentration. The illusions fade, revealing the truth: they never left the mine.

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 21
SummaryContent: Melinoe's treatment records reveal that her very being is an amalgamation of countless negative emotions.

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 22
SummaryContent: Flesh has sprouted where it was never meant to; she is never meant to be a mother, yet she has become one for a "human."

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 23
SummaryContent: Melinoe must be stopped at all costs, before that child can cause any more harm.

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 23
SummaryContent: Melinoe wove an enormous web for the "child," and in doing so, she became trapped herself.

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 24
SummaryContent: Back in the conservation area, everyone seems to have completely forgotten Melinoe and the child. Life appears unnervingly normal... but is that really so?

Title: Where Nightmares Dwell: Chapter 25
SummaryContent: Hassen opens his eyes, awakening from his long reverie.
